title: Plants assimilate ammonium and nitrate ions

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following processes. 
(A) Nitrification 
(B) Denitrification 
(C) Assimilation 
(D) Ammonification 
(E) Nitrogen fixation
content.question: Plant roots absorb ammonium ions and nitrate ions for use in making molecules such as DNA, amino acids, and proteins.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
